title: Warm salad of potatoes, sweet red onions and oregano (insalata di patate, cipolle rosse e oregano)

default: 2 small sweet red onions, sliced very thinly
2 tbsp green olives, pitted and quartered lengthways

steps: Cook the potatoes in their skins until tender. Drain and remove the skins immediately.
Quarter them lengthways and place in a large bowl together with the sliced onions and green olives.
Add the oregano, olive oil, vinegar and salt. Mix well and serve immediately.
